job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
THE ROLE
As an experienced Software Engineer you’ll lead the design and development of software for the current and next generation of Tesla’s Enterprise Resource Planning systems. In this role, you’ll be developing highly complex applications, while acting as a team leader and project manager, with the goal of streamlining business operations and improving overall user experience. The ideal candidate is a highly skilled engineer with proven ability to prioritize well and juggle multiple projects in a fast-paced environment, all while making an impact contributing to a cross-functional team. Your ability to creatively collaborate and execute team goals will affect scalability and directly contribute to the company mission of accelerating the world’s transition to sustainable energy.
Responsibilities
Work closely with wide variety of functional areas, teams and stakeholders across the business to evaluate, estimate, guide, design and ultimately bring large high impact projects to a successful and timely completion.
Create designs, prototypes and proof-of-concepts to demonstrate your proposals.
Lead multiple projects and teams simultaneously.
Continually learn, set, teach and apply software development best practices, design patterns, tools and technologies.
Design and develop new modules on the home grown ERP application Warp which is to plan, procure and produce cars.
Develop scalable solutions using tools like Angular, C# dotNet, MySQL and other open stack frameworks.
Requirements
Continually practiced the following for past 6+ years: Designing and integrating multi component systems, Web Service Development
Architecture
RESTful API Design & Implementation using C# or equivalent platform
API Versioning
API Security
Automated Testing: Unit, Functional, Performance
OOP&D: Domain Driven Design, Utilizing well-known design patterns
Web Frontend Development: JavaScript, Angular, React, etc., Optimization & Performance Tuning
Relational Database experience with strong query planning experience
Asynchronous Programming: Multi-threaded, Queue, Event-based applications
Distributed Application Development: MicroService Architecture, Caching, Distributed Source Control (Git)
Infrastructure Development: Infrastructure as Code, Zero Downtime Deployments, Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)
Agile Development
Distributed Application Development, preferred: Containerized (Docker), Stateless Services
Test Driven Development (TDD) , preferred
Experience using our current tech stack, preferred: Frontend: Angular | React, Backend: C# | Go, Data: SQL
Education: BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent degree.
